archimate:Requirement.name: PE.1.3.1: Utilities (e.g. electricity, telecommunications, water supply, gas, sewage, ventilation and air conditioning) supporting critical facilities (including locations that house critical technical infrastructure, industrial control systems and specialised equipment) should be identified and protected in accordance with the criticality and sensitivity of information handled by those facilities.
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
